name: Mr Diggins Treasure Trove
description:
Find Jewels, defeat bad guys and reach the goal! Enemies kan be killed from above, under or the side!

CONTROLS:

Move: A/D

Down  Arrow: Dig! Find dirt patches to dig in! When jumping up from a dig you can hit your enemies from under them.

Other Arrow Keys: Slash with your claws to hit your enemies from the side!

All assets are made by me including music, sfx and graphics. 

Using Godot, Reaper, Bfxr and Game Maker's built in drawing tool.

Font: Minecraft

Twitter: @potatislc
